channel.title: Comments for page "Pet Food"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Pet Food"

item.title: Cost for a pet
item.content:encoded:
it takes 100 pet foods to buy a pet and each start at level 1.

"If you give your Pet a special Item on this menu, it will also Level up (again, 100 max). Pets give special bonuses at max Level!"

There are 6 listed pets, and they are

Ninja Kitty lv 0 (1%-20% Kaiju damage)

Cave Puppy lv 0 (1%-20% Item Find)

Awkward Penguin lv 0 (???) you need 30 total levels in pets before you can get this one

Ninja Tortoise lv 0 (???) you need 30 total levels in pets before you can get this one

Honey Badger lv 0 (???) you need 100 total levels in pets before you can get this one

Ninja squirrel lv 0 (???) you need 100 total levels in pets before you can get this one
